name: currently-airing-anime
description: Get currently airing anime shows via a simple API

scripts.build: tsc && babel ./lib/currentlyAiringAnime.js -o ./lib/currentlyAiringAnime.es2015.js && babel ./lib/currentlyAiringAnime.js -o ./lib/currentlyAiringAnime.js && rollup ./lib/currentlyAiringAnime.js --format umd --name currentlyAiringAnime --output ./lib/currentlyAiringAnime.js

author: Rick Lancee <https://github.com/ricklancee/>
